PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07962010-06-17EC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the GASOLINE REGULATIONS
PrecisRegulations Amending the GASOLINE REGULATIONS in order to exempt the use of leaded gasoline in competition vehicles indeterminately. This approach is aligned with that of the United States, which continues to exempt leaded fuel for use in competition vehicles and is not planning to ban or restrict such use. The current temporary exemption expired December 31, 2009. Environment Canada, with the support of Health Canada, will conduct a five year review and will revisit this decision based on science, technology, and fuel replacement developments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0134 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
